entry.title: ODOT CONTINUES EXIT 125 NORTHBOUND OFF-RAMP PROJECT

entry.title: Falleni receives 2024 Nicholas J. Goirigolzarri Memorial Scholarship
entry.summary: Roseburg High School senior Massimo Falleni is the recipient of the 2024 Nicholas J. Goirigolzarri Memorial scholarship. He will receive $1,500 to pursue his career goals of a degree in physics/astrophysics.

entry.title: Douglas County Farm Bureau announces six scholarship recipients
entry.summary: The Douglas County Farm Bureau announced the recipients for the 28th year of scholarships. Each recipient will receive $1000 scholarship for the 2024-25 school year to further their higher education in a field of agriculture or forestry.
